location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, Temporarily in Charge of the Residency, Bushire, to Captain William Black, Adjutant, Marine Battalion, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, temporarily in charge of the Residency, informs Captain William Black that three sepoys belonging to the detachment of the Marine Battalion, who were attached to the Residency, have died during the course of the last month. Dow encloses a list (not included) of the three sepoys' names, along with the names of three other sepoys who have been received from the Honourable Company cruisers, the Prince of Walesand the Vestal, in lieu of the deceased sepoys.
